quest.name: Rat Bandits
journal: This luckless merchant is desperate for help.
objectives: Deliver the stolen sack to Ansger.
Deliver the crate of minerals to the luckless merchant.

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: Hello there, friend. Don't suppose you'd have time to help a man in his hour of need?

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: I'd come here to buy minerals that I was meant to supply the Resistance with. The only problem is, I was robbed of all my gil by Qiqirn bandits on the way here!

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: Who's going to use a merchant that can't deliver the goods he claims to sell? Please, head to Momoroon's Milk and take back my money.

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: Once you have collected my gil, give it to a man by the name of Ansger in this village. He's the one I had procure the minerals for me.

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: In the meantime, I'll head back to Rhalgr's Reach and ask them to wait a little longer for their order. Bring the minerals to me as soon as you have them.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Hello there, lasslad! Do you have business with me?

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: The merchant who ordered the minerals asked you to bring me his payment? I take it you must've reclaimed his gil from those pesky Qiqirn?

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Ha ha, you have my thanks! I was not best pleased when I heard he would be late in paying me.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Here are his minerals. Get them to him as quickly as possible. No doubt he's worrying himself sick.

dialogue.name: ANSGER
dialogue.text: Get his minerals to him as quickly as possible. No doubt that merchant's worrying himself sick.

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: The minerals. Do you have them?

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: Oh, I am positively indebted to you. At last, I can fulfill the Resistance's order.

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: Frankly speaking, the minerals found around Ala Gannha aren't of the best quality.

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: But I can't help but want to support a struggling village. They have been through so much.

dialogue.name: PITYMERCHANT02654
dialogue.text: I will need to be careful I do not go the same way as their quarry. I had made a point of not hiring protection when traveling to save on money, but I'm not much use to anyone if I'm robbed of all my gil. Here, take this as a token of my thanks.
